title: Drop Hack 2015 D=
body:
Hey guys, I just started a game no more than 15 mins ago, 10 mins into the game as i am about to get the 1st tower of the game. Boom! Whole team dc's, Close league and attempt to reconnect (firewall error appears) to no avail.

10/10 was drop hack. I understand that their isn't a whole lot you can do about that sort of stuff although i thought i would bring it to your attention in case anything has changed since last time i was drop hacked D=

Thanks lads and keep up the solid work.

replies.body: Riot said that there was something wrong with their provider. How is that a drop hack?
